verses.verse: Cast <S%H7971><s%> thy <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H4325>waters:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thou shalt <S%H4672>find<s%> it after <S%H7230>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

Give <S%H5414><s%> a <S%H2506>portion<s%> to <S%H7651>seven,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> to <S%H8083>eight;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1653>rain,<s%> they <S%H7324>empty<s%> themselves <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> toward the <S%H1864>south,<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north,<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where the <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H7945>falleth,<s%> <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H1933>it<s%> shall be.
He that <S%H8104>observeth<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2232>sow;<s%> and he that <S%H7200>regardeth<s%> the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7114>reap.<s%>

As <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> nor how the <S%H6106>bones<s%> do grow in the <S%H990>womb<s%> of her that is with <S%H4392>child:<s%> even <S%H3602>so<s%> thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6213>maketh<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all.<s%>

In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H2232>sow<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and in the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H5117>withhold<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H335>whether<s%> <S%H2088><s%> shall <S%H3787>prosper,<s%> either <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2088>that,<s%> or <S%H518>whether<s%> they <S%H8147>both<s%> shall be <S%H259>alike<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%>
Truly the <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H4966>sweet,<s%> and a <S%H2896>pleasant<s%> thing it is for the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H7200>behold<s%> <S%H853><s%> the sun: <S%H8121><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in them <S%H3605>all;<s%> yet let him <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7235>many.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> that <S%H7945>cometh<s%> <S%H935><s%> is <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>

Rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> O young <S%H970>man,<s%> in thy <S%H3208>youth;<s%> and let thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3190>cheer<s%> thee in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H979>youth,<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of thine <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and in the <S%H4758>sight<s%> of thine <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> but <S%H3045>know<s%> thou, <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H935>bring<s%> thee into <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

Therefore <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H3708>sorrow<s%> from thy <S%H4480>heart,<s%> <S%H3820><s%> and put <S%H5674>away<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> from thy <S%H4480>flesh:<s%> <S%H1320><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3208>childhood<s%> and <S%H7839>youth<s%> are <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>
